string.name: long_paragraph
string.p:
Dear customer,this is our cryptocurrency trading bot
We are selling this trading bot that is incoporated into the brokers system
The bot perfoms trades on your behalf,according to the configurations that you set
The settings are sent to your email after you purchase the bot and Send the code Astro@gmail.com for verification
If you are interested in purchasing the bot, follow thepayment instructions instructions below,The payment method is MPESA
Paybill 12345678
Account number:YOUR NAME
Send the code Astro@gmail.com for verification

resources.string:
Dear user,welcome to Astro Finance and eduction
Our aim is to assist you to learn and trade the financial markets
Below is the Table of contents
LEARN This page helps you learn about forex from beginner to advanced through Babypips.com website
TRADE This section helps you to open an account with a broker
It also contains charting software to assist you in trading the financial markets
VIEW MARKET NEWS This page assists you in viewing real time finance news and quotes for comodities and currencies in order to make the right trading decisions
SHOP In this page you find forex trading bots in case you want to purchase a bot The bot is added to the brokers system in order to execute your trades automatically
